languages.text: "Вот так всегда — ты их предупреждаешь, а они потом такие: "Господи боженька наш Император, да как такое случиться могло, да кто бы представить мог!" {n}Идира раздраженно сплевывает под ноги.{/n}
"Every time. I warn them, and then they go all, 'Dear Emperor, our lord and saviour, how could this have happened, who could have thought?'" {n}Idira spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вот так всегда — ты их предупреждаешь, а они потом такие: "Господи боженька наш Император, да как такое случиться могло, да кто бы представить мог!" {n}Идира раздраженно сплевывает под ноги.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Every time. I warn them, and then they go all, 'Dear Emperor, our lord and saviour, how could this have happened, who could have thought?'" {n}Idira spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n}
"Every time. I warn them, and then they go all, 'Dear Emperor, our lord and saviour, how could this have happened, who could have thought?'" {n}Idira spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n}
"Every time. I warn them, and then they go all, 'Dear Emperor, our lord and saviour, how could this have happened, who could have thought?'" {n}Idira spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n}
"Every time. I warn them, and then they go all, 'Dear Emperor, our lord and saviour, how could this have happened, who could have thought?'" {n}Idira spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n}
"Every time. I warn them, and then they go all, 'Dear Emperor, our lord and saviour, how could this have happened, who could have thought?'" {n}Idira spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n}

languages.text: 「いっつもこう。警告してやったのにも関わらず、『我が王、我が救世主の皇帝よ、なぜこんな不幸なことが？』とのたまう」{n}イディラはいらだちをあらわにして、地面につばを吐いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Every time. I warn them, and then they go all, 'Dear Emperor, our lord and saviour, how could this have happened, who could have thought?'" {n}Idira spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「いっつもこう。警告してやったのにも関わらず、『我が王、我が救世主の皇帝よ、なぜこんな不幸なことが？』とのたまう」{n}イディラはいらだちをあらわにして、地面につばを吐いた。{/n}

languages.text: “每次都是这样。我警告他们，他们却会说：‘亲爱的帝皇啊，我们的主和救星啊，怎么可能会发生这种事呢？谁能想到呢？”{n}伊迪拉恼怒地朝地上啐了口唾沫。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Every time. I warn them, and then they go all, 'Dear Emperor, our lord and saviour, how could this have happened, who could have thought?'" {n}Idira spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “每次都是这样。我警告他们，他们却会说：‘亲爱的帝皇啊，我们的主和救星啊，怎么可能会发生这种事呢？谁能想到呢？”{n}伊迪拉恼怒地朝地上啐了口唾沫。{/n}

languages.text: «Todo el rato. En cuanto les advierto, se ponen a decir: "Ay, Emperador, señor y salvador nuestro, ¿cómo ha podido pasar esto? ¿Quién lo habría visto venir?"». {n}Idira escupe en el suelo con enfado.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Every time. I warn them, and then they go all, 'Dear Emperor, our lord and saviour, how could this have happened, who could have thought?'" {n}Idira spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Todo el rato. En cuanto les advierto, se ponen a decir: "Ay, Emperador, señor y salvador nuestro, ¿cómo ha podido pasar esto? ¿Quién lo habría visto venir?». {n}Idira escupe en el suelo con enfado.{/n}

languages.text: « C'est toujours la même chose. Je les avertis, et puis tout le monde s'étonne : "Très cher Empereur, notre seigneur et sauveur, comment cela a-t-il pu arriver, qui aurait pu imaginer ?" » {n}Agacée, Idira crache par terre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Every time. I warn them, and then they go all, 'Dear Emperor, our lord and saviour, how could this have happened, who could have thought?'" {n}Idira spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est toujours la même chose. Je les avertis, et puis tout le monde s'étonne : "Très cher Empereur, notre seigneur et sauveur, comment cela a-t-il pu arriver, qui aurait pu imaginer ?" » {n}Agacée, Idira crache par terre.{/n}

languages.text: "Immer dasselbe! Ich warne sie und höre danach nur 'Lieber Imperator, Herr und Retter, wie konnte das passieren, wer hätte das gedacht?'" {n}Idira spuckt angewidert auf den Boden.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Every time. I warn them, and then they go all, 'Dear Emperor, our lord and saviour, how could this have happened, who could have thought?'" {n}Idira spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Immer dasselbe! Ich warne sie und höre danach nur 'Lieber Imperator, Herr und Retter, wie konnte das passieren, wer hätte das gedacht?'" {n}Idira spuckt angewidert auf den Boden.{/n}

languages.text: "Onları her seferinde uyaran ben ama her seferinde yok 'aman İmparator'um bu nasıl olur', yok 'yüce kurtarıcım kimin aklına gelirdi'." {n}İdira, uyuz olmuş bir hâlde yere tükürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Every time. I warn them, and then they go all, 'Dear Emperor, our lord and saviour, how could this have happened, who could have thought?'" {n}Idira spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Onları her seferinde uyarıyorum, onlar da her seferinde 'Sevgili İmparator'um, efendim ve kurtarıcım, bu nasıl olabilir, kimin aklına gelirdi?' diyor." {n}İdira sinirli bir şekilde yere tükürüyor.{/n}
